sources.title: The Rajah (1919) Directed By Hal Roach
sources.description: The Rajah Directed by Hal Roach Produced by Hal Roach Starring Harold Lloyd Release date September 14, 1919 Country United States Languages Silent English intertitles The Rajah is a 1919 American short comedy film directed by Hal Roach and starring Harold Lloyd . [ 1 ] Cast Harold Lloyd Snub Pollard Bebe Daniels Sammy Brooks Lige Conley Dee Lampton Marie Mosquini Fred C. Newmeyer Catherine Proudfit E.J. Ritter Charles Stevenson (as Charles E. Stevenson) Chase Thorne Noah Young See also Harold Lloyd filmography References "Progressive Silent Film List: The Rajah" . Silent Era . Retrieved December 8, 2010 .
